mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(md.COLLECT_TIME),'%Y-%m-%d %H') FROM t_emc_meta_data md WHERE md.COLLECT_TIME < #{time} AND md.READ_SATE = 0

SELECT a.ID,a.TIME,MAX(a.NUM) NUM FROM ( SELECT mc.ID, DATE_FORMAT( md.COLLECT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) TIME, md.COLLECT_VALUE NUM FROM t_emc_meta_data md, t_emc_meter_collect mc WHERE DATE_FORMAT( md.COLLECT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) = #{maxTime} AND md.READ_SATE = 0 AND md.TAG = mc.TAG AND mc.ISAUTO = 0 ) a GROUP BY a.ID,a.TIME
